apis.description:
Creates a webook subscription for the specified event type and
context.

operations.notes:
Creates a webook subscription for the specified event type and
context.

parameters.name: submission[ContextId]
parameters.description: The id of the context for the subscription.

parameters.name: subscription[ContextType]
parameters.description:
The type of context for the subscription. Must be 'assignment',
'account', or 'course'.

parameters.name: subscription[EventTypes]
parameters.description:
Array of strings representing the event types for
the subscription.

parameters.name: subscription[Format]
parameters.description: Format to deliver the live events. Must be 'live-event' or 'caliper'.

parameters.name: subscription[TransportMetadata]
parameters.description: An object with a single key: 'Url'. Example: { "Url": "sqs.example" }

apis.description: This endpoint uses the same parameters as the create endpoint

operations.notes: This endpoint uses the same parameters as the create endpoint

apis.description:
This endpoint returns a paginated list with a default limit of 100 items per result set.
You can retrieve the next result set by setting a 'StartKey' header in your next request
with the value of the 'EndKey' header in the response.

Example use of a 'StartKey' header object:
  { "Id":"71d6dfba-0547-477d-b41d-db8cb528c6d1","DeveloperKey":"10000000000001" }

operations.summary: List all Webhook Subscription for a tool proxy
operations.notes:
This endpoint returns a paginated list with a default limit of 100 items per result set.
You can retrieve the next result set by setting a 'StartKey' header in your next request
with the value of the 'EndKey' header in the response.

Example use of a 'StartKey' header object:
  { "Id":"71d6dfba-0547-477d-b41d-db8cb528c6d1","DeveloperKey":"10000000000001" }
